features: Stores up to 9-16 pairs of shoes, Additional bottom storage for more shoes. All shelves are height adjustable
Sturdy metal construction with washable 600 D polyester fabric, each shelf holding up to 30 lbs.
Easy Assembly Personalized Storage: You can remove the panel to build into a 2-tier or 3-tier shoe rack to fit different kind of shoes.
Great solution to keep your entryway, closet, dormitory, patio, mudroom and garage away from mess.
Product Dimension: 26.8" W x 11.2" D x 20.9" H

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Practical and Stylish Shoe Rack
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased two of these shoe racks, and I must say they exceeded my expectations. If you're looking for a simple and effective shoe storage solution, this rack is a fantastic choice.The first thing that caught my eye was the affordable price. It's a budget-friendly option that doesn't compromise on quality. The shoe rack is a great value for the money, providing a practical and organized way to keep your footwear in check.Assembly was a breeze; it took me just a few minutes to set up each rack. No complicated instructions or extra tools required – just a straightforward process that anyone can handle.One of the key highlights is its space-saving design. The shoe rack fits perfectly in my closet without taking up much room. It's a game-changer for maximizing storage in tight spaces. Now, my shoe collection is neatly organized, and I can easily find the pair I want without sifting through a pile.What I appreciate most about this shoe rack is its simplicity. It doesn't boast unnecessary frills or fancy features, but it gets the job done efficiently. The minimalist design adds a touch of elegance to my closet without overwhelming the space.Overall, if you're in need of an inexpensive and functional upgrade for your shoe storage, look no further. This shoe rack is a reliable choice that combines affordability with functionality. I'm delighted with my purchase and would recommend it to anyone seeking a practical and space-efficient solution for their footwear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product is wonderful. It holds all our shoes and very organized, sturdy and easy to assemble. Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this in a pinch after not being able to find a rack locally. The cost is cheap but the quality is good. It fits my small closet with space on the side to allow for hanging longer garments, i.e. coats or dresses. The height allows for 4 levels of show storage (I keep my flat shoes on the top) with plenty of clearance for pants, skirts, and tops. I can fit 4 pairs of shoes on each level. This I did not expect, since I have some clunky shoes. I also like the mesh material better than slats. Easy instructions. Easy to assemble. Fast shipping. Recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product, worth the price
reviews.reviewText: While not the best quality in the world, I was happy with what I got for the price. They were very easy to put together and get the job done. They were shorter than expected so I’d suggest getting an option with more tiers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little shoe organizer. I didn't expect much but was pleasantly surprised.
reviews.reviewText: I did not expect much from this product but was pleasantly surprised.Setup was easy (as expected) and this organizer ended up being a lot sturdier than I had expected. It also tucks away nicely (even the larger 3 tier organizer) under your pre-existing wardrobe situation.I've owned other shoe rack organizers in the past (both on the floor and door hanging style) and this far surpasses the others. It is just the right size.Overall, I am very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As advertised: simple!!
reviews.reviewText: I originally bought the 3-tier shoe rack, not realizing how much room Crocs take up (they are, unfortunately, the only kind of shoe I can comfortably wear these days), so I made the 3-tier into a rack for folded clothes, for which it works perfectly. I then purchased the 5-tier, and now all my Crocs have a home. Two pairs of taller shoes are on the floor, with the toes nudged under the bottom tier. It's like they take up no room at all. Winner!I initially thought about getting an all-metal or wooden shoe rack, but upon thinking about it... why? The fabric is thick, and works very well for keeping shoes from sliding, and the metal is perfectly sturdy even though it doesn't weigh a ton. It's insanely easy to put together (ehhh, so you may have to fight with a screw that's hard to line up without a bit of muscle), and the only tool you'll need to provide is a medium-sized phillips screwdriver; something that should be in everyone's home toolbox anyway. Extra screws were provided.Tip for those with bad knees, hips, or backs: alas, I'm not as young as I used to be and have trouble moving around on the floor to assemble things, so I put the shoe-rack together on top of a twin-sized bed. Worked perfectly, and it weighs next-to-nothing, so you can flip it and turn it to get at the screw you need.How many bells and whistles do you need for a shoe rack, anyway? This one is basic, it's simple, and it works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's pretty easy to put together. It holds at least 10 pairs of shoes. It's very practical, too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple Houseware Shoe Rack
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble, sturdy, comes in good size and color choices. Much better style than other I had and these stay put together. I’ve ordered again.
Hermoso, estilo minimalista, pero espacioso y la calidad de los materiales luce resistente, me encantó!!
I love this shoe stand. True to size and color. Very easy to put together. Perfect for my entry way.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good quality, Super easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Worth spending. It can accommodate 15 pair of shoes.

My 10 year old helped me build this shoe rack. It did take one person to hold the shelf poles up so the other person could screw them in place. Otherwise it was easy to build.The shelf seems very sturdy and holds lots of shoes. There are multiple holes to choose from for shelf height, so you’re able to put tall boots on the shelf as well.
